title: Beautiful 2 bed / 2 bath in a great neighborhood! Ready to view now!
posting_body: ['Essex Apartments - A place to call home!', 'Bed: 2 / Bath: 2', 'Sq.', 'Footage: 1791 sq ft', 'Rent: $3565 - $4516/Month', 'Terms: 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month', '(844) 800-3206', 'YES, WE ARE OPEN!', 'CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!', 'OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!', 'Essex Apartments is a luxury apartment complex located in Peabody, MA offering one and two bedroom apartments.', 'We offer multiple amenities available to residents including a beautiful fitness center, sparkling pool with a sundeck, and a landscape barbeque patio!', 'If you are interested in a 1 or 2 apartment we encourage you to check out our floor plans or contact our leasing office for more information.', 'Our Apartment Homes Feature:', '❖ Ask Us About Our Hardwood Flooring!', '❖ Central Air Conditioning', '❖ Disability Access', '❖ Flexible Lease Terms Available', '❖ Frost-free refrigerator', '❖ Fully-Equipped Kitchens Include Dishwashers and Breakfast Bars', '❖ On-site Storage Units Available', '❖ Private Balcony and Patio', '❖ Separate Dining Rooms In Select Apartments', '❖ Sustainable Apartment Plumbing Fixtures and HVAC Equipment', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '❖ 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance', '❖ Close to North Shore Mall', '❖ Easy Access to Maine', '❖ Easy Access to New Hampshire', Strength Equipment', '❖ Sustainable Lighting Techniques to Reduce Energy Consumption', 'Contact Info:', '(844) 800-3206', '1 Avalon Dr', 'Peabody, MA 01960', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Tue - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Pets:', '$500 Deposit.', '$75 Monthly Pet Rent.', '75 lb Weight Limit.', '2 Pet Limit.', 'Income must be at least three times the rent.', 'EQUAL HOUSING
